title: Device Connected
description: Fired when a physical device (IoT, wearable, peripheral) is paired or connected.

deviceId.description: The unique identifier of the connected device.

deviceName.description: The human-readable name of the device.

deviceType.description: The category of the connected device.

connectionType.description: The protocol or method used to connect the device.

firmwareVersion.description: The firmware version currently running on the device.

model.description: The model name or number of the device.

batteryLevel.description: The battery level of the device as a percentage.

signalStrength.description: The signal strength of the device connection.
